title: Formula
text: If you have two complex numbers $$z_1$$ $$=$$ $$r_1 \operatorname{cis}\left(\theta_1\right)$$ and $$z_2=$$ $$r_2 \operatorname{cis}\left(\theta_2\right)$$, $$z_1$$ / $$z_2$$ $$=$$ (r_1 / r_2) cis(theta_1 - theta_2)

title: Applying the formula
text: $$r_1$$ $$=$$ $$5\sqrt{2}$$, $$r_2$$ $$=$$ $$\sqrt{2}$$, $$\theta_1$$ $$=$$ pi, and $$\theta_2$$ $$=$$ $$\frac{2\pi}{3}$$. Plug these into the formula above!

title: Simplifying
text: We have 5(cos(pi/3) + isin(pi/3)) after plugging in. Evaluate the trigonometric functions and distribute for your final answer!
